item.title: Examining the Impact of Social Distancing on Household-Level Economic Performances in Vietnam
item.description: During the COVID-19 pandemic, governments implemented social distancing measures to curb the spread of the virus. However, these measures also impacted peopleâ€™s socioeconomic well-being.

item.title: Understanding the Economic Impact of Vaccination
item.description: The World Bank East Asia and the Pacific Economic Update April 2022 analyzed challenges and opportunities facing the East Asia and the Pacific (EAP) region.
